item.description:
I figure there has to be more to this than just a ride to Kimball's - pre-work-up-appetite-ride TBA

I know I have this planned for 6PM, but if possible I'd like to make it earlier in the day or make it a 2 part thing and meetup with the second half when they get off werk.

As the day gets closer, I'll send out another email.

Paul


Kimball's in Westford opens today, I know it's April fools but this is no joke!

Come join me for the best ice cream this side of anything!

Flavors:

Banana*

Black Raspberry

Butter Pecan

Buttercrunch

Butterscotch

Cappuccino Crunch*

Caramel Cashew Chip

Cherry Vanilla Chip

Chocolate

Chocolate Almond

Chocolate Chip

Chocolate Nut

Chocolate Mint Oreo*

Chocolate Chip Cookie-Dough

Chocolate Peanut Butter

Chocolate Raspberry Swirl

Coconut Almond Chip

Coffee

Coffee Heath Bar Crunch

Coffee Oreo

Cookie & Cream

Frozen Pudding

German Chocolate Fudge*

Gingersnap Molasses*

Grapenut

Heath Bar Crunch

Heavenly Mash*

Kahlua Crunch

M&ampM

Malted Milk Ball*

Maple Walnut

Maple Walnut (Sugar Free)

Mint Oreo

Mint Chocolate Chip

Mocha Almond

Mocha Almond Assault

Mocha Chip

Orange Pineapple

Oreo

Peach*

Peanut Butter Chip

Peppermint Stick

Pistachio Nut

Pralines & Cream*

Pumpkin*

Raspberry Chocolate Chip

Rum Raisin*

Strawberry

Vanilla

Vanilla Peanut Butter

Vanilla Swiss Almond

White Chocolate Almond*

Their Carlisle Location opens on April 8th!

Paul
item.name: Wednesday Ride Series - Kimball's Carlisle opens April 8th!
